Aeotec Smart Dimmer
--------------------------------
Aeotec Smart Dimmer 2E, Z-Wave Plug-in Dimmable Lamp Controller
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


	.. image:: ../../images/dimmable_module_switch/aeotec_smart_dimmer.jpg
	.. :align: left

Specification
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	- Operating distance: Up to 550 feet / 150 meters outdoors. 
	- Input: 120V~, 60Hz. (USA Version) 
		230V~, 50Hz. (EU, AU Version) 
	- Output: 120V~, 60Hz, Max 15A Resistor load. (USA Version) 
		230V~, 60Hz, Max 16A Resistor load. (EU Version) 
		230V~, 60Hz, Max 10A/15A Resistor load. (AU Version) 
	- Operating temperature:  0 °C  to 40 °C .  
	- Relative humidity: 8‐80%

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	#. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
	#. Push z-wave button once to reset device. Device will be included/excluded to/from zwave network.
	
	.. image:: ../../images/dimmable_module_switch/aeotec_smart_dimmer_desc.jpg
	.. :align: left

	
Link in Amazon
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	https://www.amazon.com/Aeotec-Dimmer-Z-Wave-Dimmable-Controller/dp/B00H5U40L8

Configuration description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
	N/A
